public class BaseValueMapRenderer
extends BaseRenderer
implements ValueMapRenderer

A standard implementation of the ValueMapRenderer.

setLegendSubtitle

public void setLegendSubtitle(String text)
By default, whenever you call setFied, the Legend Subtitle text is set to be the name of the ValueMap field enclosed in brackets, like this "(Population)". But you can modify the default by using this method - but, you will need to call setLegendSubtitle() after calling setField().

Parameters:
text - the new subtitle text, null == no subtitle (this is ok)
See Also:
getLegendSubtitle()
